page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content: The two main areas for shopping in {Catterick Garrison}are Shute Road and a row of shops in Hilyard Row known as the{White Shops.}Shute Road has a Naafi while the{White Shops}have a Spar supermarket. Both areas have a newsagent and a Chinese take-away.The shops tend to change quite often because of the high rents.At the{White {Shops}the Chemist shop has been there for over 30 years while the Butcher has been there only a month.The main Post Office and two banks are in Richmond Road close to Shute Road. There are two other small Naafi's ,one in Horne Road and one in Loos Road. {Scotton Village}has its own small supermarket and a local shop with a sub-post office.Most people do their main shopping in Richmond and Darlington.
